title: LF DUO SUPPORT PLAYER TO CREATE A BOND WITH!
body: Hey guys i Main ADC I also do stream on twitch.tv/elimposipi and i am looking for a good fun support player to bond and play with for long time and develope teamwork and more for the games we play im usely active alot every day just looking for someone who enjoys bot lane as much as i do i am silver 3 atm but on other i am gold 3 !! if interested leave a comment or add me in game eadweald or even come onto my stream when it on and we have a look

replies.body:
I main support and also enjoy playing adc so I know what works well for the ADC as a support role player, only started playing  towards the end f season 4 and ended the season ranked in Silver IV. I'm currently sitting in the bronxz where %%%% gets real hot fast and players be afkin' and throwing out gang related signs with the intent to %%%% up your day(even if they are on your team).

I'm looking for a fresh start, someone who will work together well with me. They must be mature and by that  I mean no one under the age of 21.

I'm on everyday after work, and weekends, so keen to give it a go if you're interested.

IGN: Skunken
yo , I haven't played that much support recently but I wouldn't mind having someone to duo lane with. I would just need to broaden my champion pool a bit. Silver 1 season 5 was gold 4 last season
